short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play a remake of classic Frogger.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Bug Hop - a playful Chrome extension that transforms your new tab into a modern remake of the classic Frogger game, but with a twist! Guide your courageous bug across busy lanes of bugs as you hop your way to victory

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Bug Hop extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to that provided by the service. The search results will be provided by Yahoo.

Privacy Policy: https://2050.one/privacy/
